name: Legend of the Double Dragon
description:
• 1992, NEW YORK -
    IN THIS CITY, ALSO KNOWN AS THE CAPITAL OF CRIME,
    BILLY AND JIMMY LEE, TWIN MARTIAL ARTS
    GRANDMASTERS HAVE OPENED A DOJO.
    THEY TEACH A MARTIAL ART STYLE THEY CREATED
    NAMED "SOU SETSU-KEN". IT IS SO FAST AND
    POWERFUL THAT THE PEOPLE CALLED IT
    "THE FIST THAT WHIRLS". THE DOJO BECAME VERY
    POPULAR IN A SHORT PERIOD OF TIME, SPECIALLY
    AFTER THE TWINS DEFEATED THE "BLACK SHADOW
    WARRIORS" LEADER, WILLY, YEARS AGO.

ONE OF THE DISCIPLES OF THE DOJO WAS BILLY'S
GIRLFRIEND NAMED MARIAN. SHE IS ALSO A COP,
A NARCOTICS AGENT AT HER POLICE STATION,
AND WAS INVESTIGATING A DRUG SMUGGLING
CARTEL. ONE DAY, SHE HAS NOT BEEN SEEN AT THE
DOJO ANY MORE, SO IT IS BELIEVED THAT SHE
FOUND OUT ABOUT THE REBIRTH OF THE
"BLACK SHADOW WARRIORS".
SEVERAL DAYS LATER, THE LEE TWINS
RECEIVED A LETTER SIGNED BY THE EVIL GANG,
WITH AN OFFER THEY CAN'T ACCEPT.

"WE HAVE THE GIRL, SO IF YOU WANT HER BACK
WITH YOU IN ONE PIECE, YOU BETTER JOIN US AND
BECAME OUR SUBORDINATES, SO WE CAN
EXPAND THE "GEN SETSU-KEN" KUNG FU STYLE.
TIME IS RUNNING OUT, DOUBLE DRAGONS!
SO WHAT IT'S GONNA BE?"

SENSEI "D"
- BLACK SHADOW WARRIORS -

This game is all about SNES Double Dragon old school action! You can play it just like it originally used to do, but with a twist! In this game, you can switch styles, in other words, you can choose your fight style to all of the past Double Dragon games! Plus, you can cancel some attack animations by just pressing Punch or Kick and get an avalanche of all-new attack chains and combos never seen before for a total of something like 40+ different attacks for each Dragon!

The game tries to give a cinematic view to the untold story of Return of Double Dragon, the Japanese version of Super Double Dragon, based on the original vision of Mr. Muneki Ebinuma, original Technos producer of the 90's game.

So, what are you waiting for? Get this ASAP and kick some Black Shadow Warriors asses!

UPDATE: Try the new CHALLENGE MODE! Hard as hell! Do you have what it takes to defeat all those enemies?
